import sys

def main():
    """
    The main function.
    """
    num_dishes = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    dish_order = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    dish_satisfaction = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    dish_bonus = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]

    satisfaction = 0
    for i in range(num_dishes):
        dish_idx = dish_order[i] - 1
        satisfaction += dish_satisfaction[dish_idx]
        if i > 0:
            prev_dish_idx = dish_order[i - 1] - 1
            if prev_dish_idx == dish_idx - 1:
                satisfaction += dish_bonus[prev_dish_idx]
    print(satisfaction)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
